results.code:
862         Release.objects.raw(
863             f"""
864         SELECT lr.project_id as actual_project_id, r.*
865         FROM (
866             SELECT (
867                 SELECT lrr.id
868                 FROM sentry_release lrr
869                 {release_project_join_sql}
870                 WHERE lrp.project_id = p.id
871                 ORDER BY COALESCE(lrr.date_released, lrr.date_added) DESC
872                 LIMIT 1
873             ) as release_id,
874             p.id as project_id
875             FROM sentry_project p
876             WHERE p.id IN %s
877         ) as lr
878         JOIN sentry_release r
879         ON r.id = lr.release_id
880             """,
881             # formatting tuples works specifically in psycopg2
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
